Name: Battle Imagine - Iron Fang
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Iron Fang's Battle Imagine skill: Ultimate! Infernal Thrust.

Ultimate! Infernal Thrust
Summon Boss: Iron Fang, dealing large-area Attack Damage to surrounding enemies and inflicting Wound.
Wound: Healing received decreases by 100% for 15s.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
